"Rod Boot Camp VI":
"There you are. Joseph, retired ARKS training officer, at
your service. I wanted to congratulate you on
completing that last boot camp. But, and I do mean
"But" with a capital B, the way of the rod is long and
difficult. On this training mission, I want you to show
me everything you've learned so far.

*Complete the mission within 22 minutes and earn an
S Rank on Hard difficulty or above, using rods only."

"来たか！　退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
先の特訓の達成に、まずはおめでとうと
言っておこう。
だが、だがしかし！
ロッドの道は長い！
これより提示する課題をこなし
その実力を示してみせるといい！

※長杖系限定
ハード以上、22分以内、Ｓランククリア"
